html:
Household Hazardous Waste Collection Event
Do you have unwanted Household Hazardous Waste? Drop it off this Saturday from 8:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. at the Olathe HHW Facility (1420 S. Robinson Drive). Can't make it out this Saturday? Residents can make an appointment 24 hours in advance to drop off unwanted HHW items by calling Customer Service at 913-971-9311. Visit http://bit.ly/1b9VIdf for additional information and a list of acceptable items.
